result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Joel M Salazar

records.addlTxt: and Motion for Time to File Additional Pretrial Motions
records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant
Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt: Return date on November 16, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Pre-trial conference on October 14, 2022 at 10:30 am.

1:52 PM Defendant Joel M Salazar in court.  Prosecuting attorney Michael X. Albrecht in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Court states case and State states appearances.  Court questions DE on PD application.  DE states he didn't qualify for PD appt.  Court notes DE has a new case w/an INIT on 9/21.  State cannot proceed due to victim notification.  DE states he is aware of that case.  Court finds DE conditionally indigent and appoints Atty Saralinda Watts (608) 616-0559.  To reimburse COC's office $50/month beginning on or before 10/1/2022 and then by the 1st of each month thereafter.  22CM390 will track with this case and the same counsel/dates will apply to that case.  DE works in Deforest so wage assignment to be done - Signal 88 in Madison is employer.
Return date scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 14, 2022 at 10:30 am.

1:56 pm.  State by Atty Albrecht and DE appears in person and w/o counsel.  DE rec'd copy of complaint.  Court advises DE of charges/max penalties.  Court orders $500 signature bond.  Special bond conditions of:  Booking on 11/16/22.
